message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.SI 

The paper deals with image denoising, which is a common problem in computer vision and image processing. The use of self-similarity and sparse linear approximation of natural images suggests that the paper may belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) or information theory (cs.IT) sub-categories. The mention of color and multispectral images suggests that the paper may also belong to the multimedia (cs.MM) or signal processing (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the mention of training a global patch basis suggests that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV and cs.IT, followed by cs.MM, cs.SI, and cs.LG.
